topics.name: Word Vectors
topics.details: Representations of words as dense vectors capturing semantic relationships. Similar words have similar vectors.

subtopics.name: Word2Vec
subtopics.details: Learns word embeddings by predicting surrounding words (CBOW) or being predicted from them (Skip-gram).

subtopics.name: GloVe
subtopics.details: Global Vectors for Word Representation.  Leverages word co-occurrence statistics across the whole corpus.

subtopics.name: Cosine Similarity
subtopics.details: Common metric to measure similarity between word vectors.

subtopics.name: Word Analogies
subtopics.details: Evaluating word vectors by solving analogies like 'king - man + woman = queen'.

topics.name: Recurrent Neural Networks (RNNs)
topics.details: Neural networks designed for sequential data, processing information with a hidden state that captures past context.

subtopics.name: Vanishing/Exploding Gradients
subtopics.details: Challenges in training RNNs due to repeated multiplications of gradients during backpropagation through time.

subtopics.name: LSTM (Long Short-Term Memory)
subtopics.details: A specific RNN architecture designed to address vanishing/exploding gradient problems, enabling learning long-range dependencies.

subtopics.name: GRU (Gated Recurrent Unit)
subtopics.details: Another RNN architecture similar to LSTM, offering a simpler structure while effectively managing gradients and capturing dependencies.

subtopics.name: Applications
subtopics.details: Examples include machine translation, language modeling, sentiment analysis, speech recognition, etc.
